front.title: Transport Layer Security and Datagram Transport Layer Security Heartbeat Extension

abstract.t: This document describes the Heartbeat Extension for the TransportLayer Security (TLS) and Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS)protocol.The Heartbeat Extension provides a new protocol for TLS/DTLS allowingthe usage of keep-alive functionality without performing arenegotiation and a basis for PMTU discovery for DTLS.
